title: Spaceranger count
text:
ID: spaceranger_count
Namespace: mapping



Source
Align fastqs and detect tissues

title: Spaceranger count
text:
Example commands
You can run the pipeline using nextflow run.

View help
You can use --help as a parameter to get an overview of the possible parameters.
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -main-script target/nextflow/mapping/spaceranger_count/main.nf \
  --help


Run command


Example of params.yaml



nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -profile docker \
  -main-script target/nextflow/mapping/spaceranger_count/main.nf \
  -params-file params.yaml






Note



Replace -profile docker with -profile podman or -profile singularity depending on the desired backend.

title: Spaceranger count
text:
Argument group

Arguments








Name
Description
Attributes




--input_fastqs
Path to the fastq files.
file, required, example: "/path/to/bcl"


--input_tif
Path to the tif file
file, required, example: "path/to/tif"


--reference_genome
Path to the reference genome
file, required, example: "path/to/ref_genome"


--output
The name of the folder to store the results in
file, required, default: "outs"


--id
ID name for temporary output directory.
string, default: "output"


--sample
Sample name to analyze.
string, example: "test_sample"


--lanes
Lanes associated with this sample.
integer, example: 1


--slide
Slide associated with this sample.
string

title: Spaceranger count
text: Authors

title: Cellranger arc count
text:
Example commands
You can run the pipeline using nextflow run.

View help
You can use --help as a parameter to get an overview of the possible parameters.
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -main-script target/nextflow/multiomics/cellranger_arc_count/main.nf \

Run command


Example of params.yaml

  -r main_build -latest \
  -profile docker \
  -main-script target/nextflow/multiomics/cellranger_arc_count/main.nf \

Replace -profile docker with -profile podman or -profile singularity depending on the desired backend.

title: Cellranger arc count
text:
Argument group

Arguments








Name
Description
Attributes




--libraries_path
Path to the libraries
file, required, example: "/path/to/libraries"


--reference_genome
Path to the reference genome
file, required, example: "/path/to/reference_genome"


--output
Path to the output directory
file, required, example: "/path/to/directory"


--run_id
The run ID
string, required


--peaks
Path to the bed file to use for peak calling
file, example: "/path/to/bed"


--neurips
Unknown
boolean, default: FALSE

title: Run star and htseq
text:
Example commands
You can run the pipeline using nextflow run.

View help
You can use --help as a parameter to get an overview of the possible parameters.
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -main-script target/nextflow/mapping/run_star_and_htseq/main.nf \
  --help


Run command


Example of params.yaml



nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -profile docker \
  -main-script target/nextflow/mapping/run_star_and_htseq/main.nf \
  -params-file params.yaml






Note



Replace -profile docker with -profile podman or -profile singularity depending on the desired backend.

title: Run star and htseq
text:
Argument group

Arguments








Name
Description
Attributes




--taxon
Reference genome for mapping fun
string, required, example: "homo"


--input
Path to the directory containing the fastq.gz files to align
file, required, example: "path/to/fastqs"


--output
Output folder
file, required


--star_proc
Number of processes to give to each STAR run
integer, default: 16


--num_partitions
Number of groups to divide samples into
integer, default: 10


--partition_id
Index of sample group.
integer, default: 0


--min_size
Minimum file syze in bytes for a file to be realigned
integer, default: 50000

text:

View help

  -r main_build -latest \

Example of params.yaml

  -r main_build -latest \

title: Spaceranger mkfastq
text:
Argument group

Arguments








Name
Description
Attributes




--input
Path to the untarred BCL files.
file, required, example: "/path/to/bcl"


--sample_sheet
The path to the sample sheet.
file, example: "SampleSheet.csv"


--output
The folder to store the demux results
file, required, example: "/path/to/output"
